name: Metal Fight Beyblade Portable: Chouzetsu Tensei Vulcan Horses
overview: Gingka finds Galaxy Pegasus and a mysterious blader appears. His name is Masamune and he wants to fight. After the victory we get to the qualifying match at the World Championship. Gingka collects the team from Yu Tendo, Masamune and Tsubasa. Together they travel the world in order to defeat other teams .
